author: mwbrooks
msg: Quick Fix: Template is viewable on mobile devices.
- I used a CSS Media Query with the max width as 1024px (iPad)
- Will this come back to bite me for low res desktop displays?
A more solid fix will come when the template is cleaned up and
a proper mobile stylesheet is created.
Thanks Bruno Alexandre for finding this issue.
